description: Steve Hammond is reluctantly packing his things when wayward lover Troy MacKenzie arrives.  Troy comes up behind Steve, putting his head between Steve's shoulder blades and wraps his arms aroound his lover.  'Please don't leave, Steve, please don't,' Troy pleads as he replaces Steve's picture on the dresser.  Steve whirls around, pins Troy down on the bed and delivers a declaration of his love.  Troy smothers his sobbing by embracing Steve -- pledging never to stray again.  Their bodies melt into one in an exchange of fiery passion taking each other to heights beyond ecstasy.  Every nerve ending is sending pounding sensations through their aching loins.  The giving of one another, ever wanting to ultimately satisfy each other...spilling forth their streams of satisfaction as they reunite.
title: Touch Me
